using namespace std;

#define ll long long
#define vt vector
#define mod 1000000007

ll expopow(ll a,ll b,ll m)
{
	if(b==0)
		return 1;
	else
	{
		if(b&1)
		{
			return (a*expopow(a,b-1,m))%m;
		}
		else
		{
			ll temp = expopow(a, b>>1,m)%m;
			return (temp*temp)%m;
		}
	}
}

int main()
{
	ll t,k,n;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld %lld",&k,&n);
		ll ans;
		if(n==1)
			ans=1;
		else if(n==2)
			ans=k;
		else
		{
			ll temp = expopow(2,n-3,mod-1);
			ans = expopow(k,temp,mod)%mod;
		}
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
	system("pause");
	return 0;
}
